title: Emma Raducanu's Tennis Match Schedule Problem
summary: Emma Raducanu is a tennis player who is playing in the Australian Open tournament. She arrived in Melbourne on Saturday and has to play her first match on Sunday night. This gives her less than two days to practice and get ready. She thinks it is hard to play so soon after traveling. Also, her match might start very late at night because it is after a men's match that could take a long time. Raducanu says this schedule does not make sense for her and other players. She wants more time to prepare and thinks late matches are not good for athletes.

to train and get better at something

background_read: The Australian Open is a major tennis tournament held every year in Melbourne, Australia. Players from around the world compete to win. Sometimes, matches are scheduled late at night, which can be tiring for athletes. Emma Raducanu is a British tennis player who won the US Open in 2021. She is speaking out about the schedule to help make things better for players.
Article_Structure: WHO: Emma Raducanu, a tennis player
WHAT: She is unhappy with her match schedule at the Australian Open
WHY: Because she has little time to prepare and might play very late at night

perspectives.description: Raducanu thinks the schedule is unfair and hard for athletes
